Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8iMindLibCS.name: darken(_:)
Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8iMindLibCS.abstract: Creates a darker color from the receiver by altering it’s brightness by a percent (using the HSBA color space).

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8iMindLibCS.abstract: Creates a lighter color from the receiver by altering it’s brightness by a percent (using the HSBA color space).

Extensions/UIColor.html#/s:FE8iMindLibCS.name: darker(than:)
